Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: There were dose - dependent increases in FEV1 and FEF25 - 75 ( p less than 0 . 001 ) , and pretreatment with HDS did not displace the DRC to the right .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| HDS |
| FEV1 |
| FEF25-75 |

In this paragraph, "HDS" is the only clear chemical entity mentioned. "FEV1" and "FEF25-75" are not chemicals but rather measurements of lung function (Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second and Forced Expiratory Flow between 25% and 75% of the FEV1, respectively).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| HDS |

In this paragraph, only "HDS" is a clear chemical entity mentioned. "FEV1" and "FEF25-75" are not chemicals but rather measurements of lung function.
